授業目的: 本講義は、政治学を初めて学ぶ受講生を対象に、政治学の学問背景や基本的な知識を学ぶことを目的とする。
到達目標:
以下の諸点を授業の目標として設定しています。
・政治の世界を理解する為の学問的基盤を身につける。
・クリティカルな思考と分析力を養成する。
・政治学における基礎的な専門用語とコンセプトを習得する。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This class will be conducted in a regular classroom setting face to face from the first class.  Students permitted to take classes onlin will join the class via Zoom.  There may be some class cancellations and make-up classes subsequently.  Make-up classes would be held either on days designated by the school or on Saturday (time period would be decided upon consultations between lecturer and students).

評価.成績評価Grading3:
備考　Note
The course has the following three sets of requirements:

1. Regular class attendance and active participation in class.
2. One to three comment(s) or questions based on a critical analysis of the required readings in each class.
3. One media content analysis paper and presentation. Students will conduct a comparative media content analysis
in which they examine various newspapers’coverage of their chosen topic and give a presentation that
demonstrates their understanding of the topic and their mastery of analytical abilities in the study of
politics.

Course grades will be calculated in the following manner:

Class participation 30%
One to three comments or questions in each class 30%
One media analysis paper 20%
One media analysis presentation 20%
